titles: A new ballad, containing a communication between the carefull wife, and the comfortable husb[and] touching the common cares and charges of house-hold
notes: Verse - "How shall we good husband now live this hard yeare,".
Printed on same sheet with STC 13852.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Husband and wife --  Songs and music --  Early works to 1800.
